reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent all around deodorant. I initially bought it to have a scent free deodorant for hunting, now I use it everyday. It works great too, I never have BO. It’s also one of the healthiest options you can use for deodorant. Most of the other “healthy” non-toxic options have never really worked, and didn’t come close to this Arm & Hammer. No aluminum, parabens, or scent. You can’t lose, highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thank goodness for this product!
reviews.reviewText: I have sensitive skin, and many anti-perspirants cause itchiness, while other brands of deodorants have not been effective enough. My grown daughter found this Arm & Hammer Deodorant, and told me know about it right away. We have both had the same high quality experience of using this deodorant, for 1-2 years of usage: excellent protection and no skin itching or irritation. That’s why I said “thank goodness for this product,” because we have been looking for a an effective, sensitive skin woman’s product for a long time, and this is the only one we both have found that works well enough. A strong anti-perspirant would provide slightly more wetness control, but the Arm & Hammer Deodorant has been pretty close, and it stops odor. It’s comfortable to apply, not ridiculously expensive, and my grown daughter and I planning on continuing using it. It’s worth a try, without a doubt!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yay a deodorant for metal allergies!
reviews.reviewText: Over the past year or so, many signs have pointed to the fact that I am allergic to all sorts of metals. My wedding ring (white gold, which has nickel, rhodium, etc.) has left my finder with a constant rash, I have never been able to wear regular earrings without irritation, I've always been allergic to contacts and/or contact solutions, and my mom even said that the reason metal braces didn't work for me in high school is probably because I was allergic to them but they didn't realize it at the time. Similarly, over the past couple years, I have had a growing problem with deodorant - I've been using Dove for at least 20 years with no problem, until a few years ago when I started experiencing B.O. despite all efforts to get rid of it. I tried the prescription grade medicine. I tried using it more often. Nothing worked, until I switched to aluminum-free deodorant. I first tried Dove aluminum-free deodorant, but it's expensive at $10-12 per stick. So I went on Amazon to see what other options were available, and frankly, there aren't many affordable options.I tried this - at half the price of Dove aluminum-free, this Arm & Hammer (the brand my husband has used for decades) deodorant has been a miracle for me. No more B.O. at all. No more irritation at all. No stains on my clothes from the white stick (this is clear). I genuinely feel better.About the smell - yes, it kinda has a weird smell when you first put it on. The smell is vaguely rosemary and lavender, but somehow not the best it could be. It almost has an "old spice" weird smell. But the smell does fade quite quickly, and I've gotten used to the smell. I have always loved lavender and rosemary, just not usually together! hahaAbout the sweat-protection - I will admit that no, this doesn't provide quite as good sweat protection as other deodorants. But that's probably because it has fewer chemicals seeping into your armpits! I haven't really experienced a problem, but I have sweat a bit during a workout. At the end of the day, the B.O. I was previously experiencing is gone, so that's a much better result, even if I had to apply more than once per day.About the design and application - I will admit that this does not go on as well as my Dove did because of the design. I don't know why exactly, but I have to make sure the stick is pushed up really far to avoid being scraped by the plastic sides. This could get really annoying at the end of the stick, but I haven't gotten there yet (been using 1 month). I do really like that it's clear though so there is no residue or stains on my clothing.Conclusion: Yes, I will continue buying this until further notice, and I recommend for anyone with a metal allergy looking for an affordable option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ok smell, feels wet
reviews.reviewText: I got the scented one and personally, I think it smells like laundry detergent. It also leave your skin feeling wet when u apply it so need to said a few seconds for it to dry. The nice thing is that it doesn’t leave a white cast. Not as good as regular deodorant but good for a natural one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the one!
reviews.reviewText: I was testing all different deodorants and hated them all between leaving stuff behind even after showering or just let me stink all day because it didn’t work. I was looking for a non toxic option so I googled and this was one of them that came up. It does not disappoint. After having my baby, my odor changed (yes I know that’s gross). But this is non toxic, feels amazing, comes off in the shower with ease and smells AMAZING. It’s so good that even my man changed to this deodorant. Wont ever change deodorants again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Staple in Our Routine!
reviews.reviewText: What's most important to know is that if you're looking for a deodorant that combines a great scent, suitability for sensitive skin, and long-lasting freshness, the Arm & Hammer Essentials Fresh is an excellent choice.In conclusion, the Arm & Hammer Deodorant has earned its place as the only deodorant we use. The range of scents, skin-friendly formula, and long-lasting effectiveness make it a reliable and essential part of our daily hygiene routine. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I have VERY sensitive skin!!
reviews.reviewText: My skin has gotten extremely sensitive throughout the years and every single deodorant irritates my skin so bad that I have to see my doctor to get the issue fixed… HOWEVER! I seen these Arm & Hammer deodorant and thought, why not? It’s affordable, it sounds promising. And even better? After using, no skin irritation! I’ve never been more relieved to find a product that actually helps me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Smells good but that’s it
reviews.reviewText: Smells good but didn’t protect me all day

reviews.reviewTitle: Sólo para actividad en climas fríos
reviews.reviewText: Sólo los puedo usar dentro de la casa pues una vez que salgo el sudor es imparable, cierto que esta anunciado como desodorante y no antitranspirante pero por las reseñas pensé que podría funcionar, no es así. Una lástima pues el olor es agradable y no mancha la ropa aún lo uso para actividades ligeras en lugares cerrados.

reviews.reviewTitle: Probably the best deodorant known to mankind (IMHO)
reviews.reviewText: I love this stick, it doesn’t stain my shirts, smells great and lasts 24 hours for me.
